data.name: background.Text
data.value: Background

data.name: background.Help
data.value: Use first image as gallery background?

data.name: mouseWheel.Text
data.value: Mouse Wheel

data.name: mouseWheel.Help
data.value: Enable mouse wheel support for the carousel

data.name: bringToFront.Text
data.value: Bring to Front

data.name: bringToFront.Help
data.value: Moves the item clicked on to the front.

data.name: clickEvent.Text
data.value: Click Event

data.name: clickEvent.Help
data.value: The action to take when click on an image.

data.name: minScale.Text
data.value: Min Scale

data.name: minScale.Help
data.value: The minimum scale appled to the furthest item. The item at the front has a scale of 1. To make items in the distance one quarter of the size, minScale would be 0.25.

data.name: reflHeight.Text
data.value: Reflection Height

data.name: reflHeight.Help
data.value: Height of the auto-reflection in pixels, assuming applied to the item at the front. The reflection will scale automatically. A value of 0 means that no auto-reflection will appear.

data.name: reflGap.Text
data.value: Reflection Gap

data.name: reflGap.Help
data.value: Amount of vertical space in pixels between image and reflection, assuming applied to the item at the front. Gap will scale automatically.

data.name: reflOpacity.Text
data.value: Reflection Opacity

data.name: reflOpacity.Help
data.value: Specifies how transparent the reflection is. 0 is invisible, 1 is totally opaque.

data.name: xPos.Text
data.value: X Pos

data.name: xPos.Help
data.value: Horizontal position of the circle centre relative to the container. You would normally set this to half the width of the container.

data.name: xPosDefault.Text
data.value: Leave it blank to use default value (width of container / 2)

data.name: yPos.Text
data.value: Y Pos

data.name: yPos.Help
data.value: Vertical position of the circle centre relative to the container. You would normally set this to around half the height of container.

data.name: yPosDefault.Text
data.value: Leave it blank to use default value (height of container / 2)

data.name: xRadius.Text
data.value: X Radius

data.name: xRadius.Help
data.value: Half-width of the circle that items travel around.

data.name: xRadiusDefault.Text
data.value: Leave it blank to use default value (width of container / 2.3)

data.name: yRadius.Text
data.value: Y Radius

data.name: yRadius.Help
data.value: Half-height of the circle that items travel around. By playing around with this value, you can alter the amount of 'tilt'.

data.name: yRadiusDefault.Text
data.value: Leave it blank to use default value (height of container / 6)

data.name: speed.Text
data.value: Speed

data.name: speed.Help
data.value: This value represents the speed at which the carousel rotates between items. Good values are around 0.1 ~ 0.3. A value of one will instantly move from one item to the next without any rotation animation. Values should be greater than zero and less than one.

data.name: autoRotate.Text
data.value: Auto Rotate

data.name: autoRotate.Help
data.value: Turn on auto-rotation of the carousel using either 'left' or 'right' as the value. The carousel will rotate between items automatically. The auto-rotation stops when the user hovers over the carousel area, and starts again when the mouse is moved off.

data.name: autoRotateDelay.Text
data.value: Auto Rotate Delay

data.name: autoRotateDelay.Help
data.value: Delay in milliseconds between each rotation in auto-rotate mode. A minimum value of 1000 (i.e. one second) is recommended.
